channel.title: What should i do to my car
channel.description:
I drive a stock 1998 Camaro v6 3.8l supercharged 500hp with a aftermarket intake
I need some ideas, anything from aftermarket parts to aftermarket audio systems ..
Currently my speakers are aftermarket 2 6'in and 4 5' by 9' JVC speakers with a Kenwood 400watt aftermarket radio deck, 2 12in 2000watt Audiobahn subwoofers and a 3200 Watt Audiobahn amp and a Power capacitor.
I want it to be faster and better looking, if you guys know any good body kits or better subs that are a decent price that would be great.
I've put over 6k into the car so far.
Ill post pics of my car soon..

item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

mihalich:

Z28 doesn’t have the v6…

misstyped sorry, i was agreeing with him that its just a stock v6, because he mentioned RS and SS but not z28 , was just throwing it in there, and a v6 supercharged has the same horsepower of a z28 turbo’d

item.title: What should i do to my car
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

mihalich:

RS and SS both come with V8s seeing as he has a V6 its probably just a stock model with nothing special from the factory.

yeah its a z28 supercharged pushing 500hp, and yah im planning on not touching the body and just keep it like that since its an American car and it will look ratchy, anyone know a good color, right now its pearl white, and i ordered tires that smoke red for burnouts … and this is more like a project

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do to my car
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:6, topic:422697”][quote author=Classic_ link=topic=525359.msg3824983#msg3824983 date=1322097034]

Don’t fuck up a classic.

^
[/quote]
98’ isn’t classic[/quote]Well what I meant by the statement is don’t fuck it up in general. Don’t give it like 22’s and stuff like that.

item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

krackkid:

Don’t fuck up a classic.

This isn’t a classic

@Dell, leave your car what it is at already, 500hp with a tiny v6 engine is awesome, you can already beat those rice rocket pieces of shit on the road anyways, what else do you honestly need? are you driving the RS or SS? my stepdad has the 96 v8 RS convertible
